p: The EO of the leaves of Lepechinia paniculata showed moderate inhibitory activity against both cholinesterase enzymes evaluated, with IC 50 values of 38.2 ± 2.9 µg/mL against AChE and 47.4 ± 2.3 µg/mL against BuChE, whereas in the EO of the flowers, the inhibitory activity was much more marked, with IC 50 values of 28.2 ± 1.8 µg/mL against AChE and 28.8 ± 1.5 µg/mL against BuChE.
